extendedInfo.description: ERA offers a suite of tools that can be used for various RF analysis needs, targeted toward today's popular wireless standards. ERA is available for both your PC and mobile phone and is used in conjunction with Epiq Solutions' software defined radio (SDR) products. Currently ERA is compatible with Epiq Solutions' Matchstiq SDR which enables operation between 300 MHz and 3.8 GHz and supports channel bandwidths up to 28 MHz.With ERA you can:- Scan: Survey the RF environment to find signals or whitespace of interest- Identify: Use built in radio standard channel mappings to help determine signal types- Monitor: Lock in on a single channel or whitespace area to develop spectrum history- Decode: Decode supported signals for better classification and analysis- Log: Record raw IQ to file or power measurements to KML for further data post-Â­analysis- Locate: Locate signal sources using RF energy detection and integrated mappingNote: The free version of ERA allows users to view a pre-recorded GSM downlink channel. Please contact Epiq Solutions for access to the full version of ERA Mobile.

reviews.title: Looks cool but
reviews.comment: Can\'t find the key required to actually use the app. Went to the developers website and still no luck.
reviews.author: Sam Coffland

reviews.title: Spyking
reviews.comment: Still working out excatly how to use it and what all the abreviations stand for but this is the best app out there.
reviews.author: mark cras

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: After installation, I have visited their website to obtain a license key.  I could find not support for the application.  It appears this app is just a ploy to get people to visit their website.  I have played with it enough that I am disappointed.
reviews.author: George Haneke

reviews.title: Ignore other reviews
reviews.comment: To access this app dont enter a key just hit the ok button and then when you are in the app go to the menu and hit connect
reviews.author: Thomas Webber

reviews.title: Total waste of time
reviews.comment: What a total waste of time this is,  no way to get the key,  just a big joke by writer to maybe get you into their web site?   Don\'t waste your time with this....
reviews.author: Bangkok Brian

reviews.title: Vague
reviews.comment: Agree its probably used more for website and company promo. It seems to work but for very specific devices, SDR setups etc.
reviews.author: Tom Tedesco
